getBackground().Description: Provides a background for the page represented by this Fragment. A return value of @B_android#support#wearable#view#GridPagerAdapter#BACKGROUND_NONE_E@ will default to the background for the row, if supplied.

ClassDesc: starting with Android Wear 2.0 we no longer encourage bi-directional spacial models for apps. If you are looking to implement vertical paging pattern, consider using the https:##developer#android#com@B_android#support#v7#widget#SnapHelper_E@ and a https:##developer#android#com@B_android#support#v7#widget#RecyclerView_E@ instead. An optional interface for a Fragment within a GridViewPager which provides additional configurable options.
